comprehensive_overview: Program Database Toolkit (PDT) is a framework for analyzing source code written in several programming languages and for making rich program knowledge accessible to developers, analysts, and creating tools for source code understanding.
core_features: PDT analyzes multiple programming languages, builds abstract syntax trees, control-flow graphs, program dependence graphs, and call graphs; provides a rich API for programmatic access to analyzed programs; supports interactive development of program analysis methods; and enables the development of new program understanding tools.
